overview: Sou'ad is a beautiful student, who lives with a strict family. When they find out that she loves one of the employees, they prevent her from going to school. A married couple sympathizes with Sou'ad and treats her like a daughter. Sou'ad gets closer to the husband and tries to get his attention.

production_companies.name: General Egyptian Institution for  the Cinema

title: المراهقة الصغيرة
